name: The Shuttles
description:
This is the first time I've failed to complete a game jam. I do MFGJ annually to see how much I progress each year. This jam actually ended on my 17th birthday. The first time I did this jam was during summer when I was 15 years old, the game I submit was Promises of Simulated Cake. I didn't realize how much time school takes away from game development. I felt like I was accomplishing nothing everyday, and my ADHD wasn't helping. The previous two times I did this game jam I did not have school, and I was able to get a lot done. I plan to complete the game post-jam however. Currently what we have is essentially just an environment, there are a few creatures too if you want to check them out, fait warning though, don't get eaten by a glow shark or you'll have to restart the game.

Music - MichaelBogaMusic

Sound Design - Knives

Concept Art - PringleTheTringle

Writing - SNOW

Character Art - ameen6

3D Artist - Soulex

Assistant 3D Artist - Sk3lly

Programmer - Soulex
